title: Generic Container Trait Implementation
description: In this lab, we have a trait called Contains that is generic over its container type and requires explicit specification of its generic types when implemented for the Container type.

meta.title: Mastering Generic Container Trait Implementation in Rust
meta.description: Explore the intricacies of implementing generic traits in Rust, with a focus on the 'Contains' trait and its associated types.
meta.keywords: generic traits, rust playground, rust tutor, rust online compiler, container, rust commands, rust practice, rust online playground, rust online, programming
